fast3d.complex

Interface RenderAction


  • public interface RenderAction
    a render-action is called when the graphics3d sort()-methods calls it's parameter values to be rendered, for example
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(Vector3d pos, Graphics3d g)
      called when the render-action should draw something

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Vector3d pos,
            Graphics3d g)
        called when the render-action should draw something
        Parameters:
        pos - where to draw the something
        g - the context to render to
